info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 5:23PM EDT until August 15 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CATAWBA...EASTERN LINCOLN...SOUTH CENTRAL IREDELL... NORTHWESTERN MECKLENBURG AND EASTERN GASTON COUNTIES... At 523 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Lincolnton to near Gastonia, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Gastonia, Huntersville, Northwest Charlotte, Cornelius, Mt Holly, Belmont, Stanley, Cramerton, Lowell and Ranlo. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
